entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NET 8.0] Error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'CborWriter' could not be found #77296
  • superpmi-replay pipeline fails when re-run in CI due to the log artifact already existing #77295
    8.0.0
  • arm64 altjit and HW intrinsics #77294
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Assert failed: ERR41: Unknown converter for type 13 #77287
    8.0.0
  • When debugging mixed mode, stepping turns into a "go" #77286
    Future
  • Add <WasmExtraFilesToDeploy> to Up-to-date Check #77285
  • `perf-pipeline` broken because of `Signature not valid in the specified time frame:` #77278
  • MonoVM + DynamicMethod semantic compatibility break between net7 & net8 #77273
  • Fix CacheEntryExtensions.SetValue()'s signature to allow null values #77264
    8.0.0
  • Consider consolidating logic of JSON Snake/Kebab naming with Camel #77262
  • [Question] [Android] Crash due to crypto asserts #77258
  • ObjWriter duplicates sections in COFF output #77257
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort make methods virtual to allow overrides #77255
  • Control how LogValuesFormatter formats structured data, or: opt-out of enumerating structured data #77253
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\22728\\debug15\\debug15.cmd #77251
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_49982\\test49982\\test49982.cmd #77250
  • dotnet watch blocks files #77249
  • System.Drawing enumerations cause CA1416 errors when a project compiled against .NET 7 RC2 #77248
  • ConfigurationBinder fails to bind class that implements IDictionary #77246
    8.0.0
  • [WASM] "Uncaught ExitStatus ExitStatus" is encountered when a default method is defined inside the interface - NOT when it is defined inside a derived class. #77244
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.ImplicitDistributedTransactions_cannot_be_changed_after_being_read_as_true #77241
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread.sh #77240

Closed

  • System.Speech NuGet package for .NET Standard target? #77292
  • Does corerun or coreclr work normally when it loads only dll file if there are .ni.dll and .dll? #8866
    Future
  • Handle CopyFileW errors in crossgen WritePDBData() #8298
    Future
  • [Crossgen] Support multithreaded crossgen compilation #9233
    Future
  • BinSkim BA2021 on System.Private.CoreLib.dll #9321
    Future
  • Directly loading .ni.dll works differently from each `FNV/R2R` #8867
    Future
  • How to check a dll's ni file(with FragileNonVersionable option) is loaded? #8865
    Future
  • [Memory consumption] Remove relocations for Readonly section #8379
    Future
  • [Memory consumption] Remove relocations for TypeHandle fields #8248
    Future
  • Should `CacheExtensions.GetOrCreate()`/`GetOrCreateAsync()` return `TItem` instead of `TItem?`? #77266
    Future
  • `Monitor.TryEnter` sometimes fails even if `Monitor.IsEntered` returns `true` #76660
    8.0.0
  • Builds failing with error: use of undeclared identifier 'swprintf_s' #77282
    8.0.0
  • Optimize EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid #77190
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Generic ObjectFactory and ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #34471
    8.0.0
  • Published Browser-Wasm with optimization and trimming enabled works on chrome but not safari #77271
    8.0.0
  • Invalid UnixFileMode value when using the TarFile API #77096
  • System.MulticastDelegate constructors should be [DebuggerStepThrough] #77131
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #77281

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Don't trigger static ctor with [JSExport] init #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Android][tests] Replace hardcoded /tmp path #77291
    area-System.IO
  • Clean up converter initialization logic. #77290
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Decrease backlog cleanup inactivity threshold #77288
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix process aborts when using cryptographic primitives with empty input for Android #77283
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • [tests][Android] ReAdd Android library test jobs #77280
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Simplify DynamicMethod arg validation #77277
    area-System.Reflection
  • [mono][jit] Disable inlining for constrained calls on gshared paramet… #77274
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove _fdopen from PAL #77272
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [ppc64le] Fixed FSharp crash issue #77270
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] [mono][ppc64le] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #77269
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.1
  • Add support for delegate GDV in R2R and NAOT #77267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Template nits 2 #77263
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #77260
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 6.0.12
  • [wasm] optimize interop startup #77256
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fixed cross-build for clang-9 #77245
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move usages of `COMPlus_` var to `DOTNET_` fallback #77239
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix doc link #77297
    area-Meta
  • Fix recurisve `Monitor.TryEnter` to not return false due to a race condition #77243
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Fix the __int64 to be long long on macOS only #77268
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove uses of PAL's `swprintf_s` from mono. #77284
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Don't invoke EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid all the time in JIT #77237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix dotnet-pgo #77259
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adds `ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory<T>` API #77185
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Modify ARM64 thunktemplates.S to make it work with GNU ld #77275
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76955
  • Fix a signed/unsigned comparison warning #77230
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add [DebuggerStepThrough] to MulticastDelegate constructors. #77132
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Trim file type bits from mode header #77151
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove more swprintf_s uses #77228
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fixes issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command line #76965
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Update System.Speech to Eric/Jeff #77142
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Make sure all heap segment fields are populated in the DAC #77035
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update .vsconfig file #77189
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] IDBFS test #77247
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Template nits 2 #77205
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Don't use mov.vt when storing into primitive type fields #77221
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove non-deterministic signals from debugger tests. #77038
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] few JS interop tests #77218
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Clearing all cards for free regions #77224
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Filter out addresses that are not in bookkeeping range during background promote #77067
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix GCShadow for regions #77011
    area-GC-coreclr
  • statically linking GC PAL on linux #76985
    area-GC-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [mono] Vector128 ConvertTo API's for Amd64 #77211
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Migrate host.tests from Newtonsoft to STJ #76901
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] benchmark simple app without JSExport #76632
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • SmtpClientTest Assertion Fail Fix #76361
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Android] PoC: Use Java TrustManager to call RemoteCertificateValidationCallback in SslStream #77220
    NO-REVIEW, os-android
  • Simplify AppHost/ElfUtils #77208
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clean up inliner substitution #77176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold primitive-typed access to promoted structs in local morph and forbid mismatched struct assignments #76766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework
